Class ProjectRepository

java.lang.Object
ProjectRepository
public class ProjectRepository extends Object
Entity.

This ProjectRepository manages a collection of Project instances.

Provides methods to add, retrieve, update, and delete projects.

      Adds a new project to the repository.
      Parameters:

    • getAllProjects

      public static ArrayList<Project> getAllProjects()
      Returns the list of all stored projects.
      Returns:
      The list of projects.

    • setProjects

      public static void setProjects(ArrayList<Project> loadedProjects)
      Replaces the entire list of projects in the repository.
      Parameters:
      loadedProjects - The new list of projects.

    • isEmpty

      public static boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if there are any projects in the repository.
      Returns:
      true if the repository is empty, false otherwise.

    • deleteProject

      public static void deleteProject(Project project)
      Deletes the specified project from the repository.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to remove.

    • updateProject

      public static void updateProject(String name, String neighbourhood, boolean visibility, int num2Rooms, int num3Rooms, String openingDate, String closingDate, int availOfficerSlots, Manager manager, int price2room, int price3room)
      Updates the details of an existing project identified by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the project to update.
      neighbourhood - The new neighbourhood name.
      visibility - The new visibility status.
      num2Rooms - The number of 2-room flats.
      num3Rooms - The number of 3-room flats.
      openingDate - The new opening date.
      closingDate - The new closing date.
      availOfficerSlots - Number of available officer slots.
      manager - The manager assigned to the project.
      price2room - Price of 2-room flats.
      price3room - Price of 3-room flats.
